Freedium Link Converter - Read M__ium Articles Freely

Description:
A simple extension that automatically converts Medium and Towards Data Science article links to Freedium links, allowing you to read articles without hitting the monthly limit. Just click the extension icon when viewing a Medium article to convert the URL.

Features:
• One-click conversion of Medium and Towards Data Science URLs
• Works with medium.com and towardsdatascience.com domains
• Simple and lightweight
• No data collection or tracking

How to use:
1. Install the extension
2. Visit any Medium or Towards Data Science article
3. Click the extension icon to convert the URL
4. Continue reading without restrictions

Note: This extension only modifies URLs to help you access publicly available content through Freedium's service.
